org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint
Class ConstraintGroupHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint.ConstraintGroupHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ConstraintGroupHelper
extends Object
implements Serializable

Helper for the GroupedConstraint that holds a set of currently active groups and provides a factory method for wrapping Constraint instances in GroupedConstraint. An example would look like this: 


 ConstraintGroupHelper helper = new ConstraintGroupHelper();
 ...
 myFormElement1.setConstraint(
   helper.createGroupedConstraint(new MyConstraint1(), "group1"));
 myFormElement2.setConstraint(
   helper.createGroupedConstraint(new MyConstraint2(), "group1"));
 ...
 myFormElement3.setConstraint(
   helper.createGroupedConstraint(new MyConstraint3(), "group2"));
 myFormElement4.setConstraint(
   helper.createGroupedConstraint(new MyConstraint4(), "group2"));
 ...
 helper.setActiveGroup("group1")

Author:
Ilja Livenson (ilja@webmedia.ee)
See Also:

Method Detail

createGroupedConstraint

public Constraint createGroupedConstraint(Constraint constraint,
                                          String group)
Wrap the constraint in the GroupedConstraint instance that is assigned to the specified group.

Parameters:
constraint - Constraint to wrap.
group - Name of the group to assign the constraint to.
Returns:
The created grouped constraint

setActiveGroups

public void setActiveGroups(Set activeGroups)
Provides a way to specify multiple active groups as a Set. The previously activated groups, that are not contained in given activeGroups parameter, are made inactive.

Parameters:
activeGroups - The names of the groups to be made active.

setActiveGroups

public void setActiveGroups(String[] activeGroups)
Provides a way to specify multiple active groups as an array of Strings. The previously activated groups, that are not contained in given activeGroups parameter, are made inactive.

Parameters:
activeGroups - The names of the groups to be made active.

setActiveGroup

public void setActiveGroup(String activeGroup)
Provides a way to specify only one active group. The previously activated groups, that are not the same as the given activeGroup, are made inactive.

If the activeGroup parameter is null, all groups will be made inactive.

Parameters:
activeGroup - The name of the group to be made active, or null.

getActiveGroups

public Set getActiveGroups()
Provides currently activated groups.

Returns:
currently activated groups.

isGroupActive

public boolean isGroupActive(String group)
Specifies whether the given group is active. The group name used in search is case-sensitive.

Parameters:
group - The name of the group to check whether it
Returns:
true, if the group with given name is active.
